mapper.select: SELECT s.stock_Name, SUM(CASE WHEN o.order_type = 0 THEN o.quantity ELSE 0 END) - SUM(CASE WHEN o.order_type = 1 THEN o.quantity ELSE 0 END) AS total_quantity FROM `order` o JOIN `stock` s ON o.stock_Id = s.stock_Id WHERE o.user_Id = #{userId} AND s.stock_Name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{stockName}, '%') GROUP BY s.stock_Name HAVING total_quantity > 0;
